replies.body: Was there a specific skin in question?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zViBhhI1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-30T03:32:51.530+0000)
>
> Was there a specific skin in question?
my cho had two skins , but i cant find it anymore. all skin locked

Ahaaaa it looks like someone was able to issue two refunds on the Nightmare Cho'Gath and Jurassic Cho'Gath skins. This is something that is pretty normal for when an account gets hacked or compromised, so I'd highly suggest reaching out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). After you verify yourself as the creator of the account, they'll be able to reverse any other damage that was done.
my cho had  two skins , but i cant find it anymore. all skin locked
